summary: A night out on the town turns into a nightmare as six young college students find themselves hunted by a killer.
cast: Michael Sarysz|Dorie Barton|Joey Lawrence|Jeff Conaway|Sara Premisler|James Mapes|Jack McGee|Greg Cipes|Sterling Rice|Angela Taylor|Britton Purvis|Thomas Anthony Jones|Chad Allen|Leonora Scelfo|Elsie Escobar|Robert Crooks|Del Tenney|Margot Hartman|Victoria Bass|Andrew Raffelson|Brette Taylor|Louis De La Costa|Jeremy Duncan|Karen Spencer
keywords: mystery killer|violence|title appears in writing|boyfriend girlfriend relationship|jealousy
title: ¿Quieres que te cuente un secreto?
